meanings.sent1: The expeditious delivery of the package impressed the customer.
meanings.sent2: She completed the task in an expeditious manner to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The expeditious squirrel quickly gathered all the nuts in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her expeditious decision-making skills were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The expeditious rabbit darted through the forest with lightning speed.

meanings.definition: Acting or done quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent1: An expeditious response to the emergency situation saved lives.
meanings.sent2: The expeditious resolution of the issue prevented further complications.
meanings.sent3: The expeditious chef prepared a feast in no time at all.
meanings.sent4: His expeditious thinking in the crisis was a lifesaver.
meanings.sent5: The expeditious runner crossed the finish line in a flash.
